test.name: As the Clerk, I should be able to insert a single record of working class hero into database via an API

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8080/calculator/insert path_url=/calculator/insert headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '108', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"natid": "123", "name": "test_name", "gender": "1", "birthday": "01011991", "salary": "2000", "tax": "500"}'

POST Response : url=http://localhost:8080/calculator/insert status=202, reason= headers={'Content-Type': 'text/plain;charset=UTF-8', 'Content-Length': '7', 'Date': 'Wed, 22 Nov 2023 11:10:18 GMT'} body=Alright

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

test.name: As the Clerk, I should be able to insert more than one working class hero into database via an API

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8080/calculator/insertMultiple path_url=/calculator/insertMultiple headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '220', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'[{"natid": "123", "name": "test_name", "gender": "1", "birthday": "01011991", "salary": "2000", "tax": "500"}, {"natid": "123", "name": "test_name", "gender": "1", "birthday": "01011991", "salary": "2000", "tax": "500"}]'

POST Response : url=http://localhost:8080/calculator/insertMultiple status=202, reason= headers={'Content-Type': 'text/plain;charset=UTF-8', 'Content-Length': '7', 'Date': 'Wed, 22 Nov 2023 11:10:18 GMT'} body=Alright

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
